channel.title: Re/Mastered - James Lucien [Multi-genre EP]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/james-lucien-official/sets/re-mastered-ep
My first EP of the best of my works, remastered and repolished for listening pleasure.
Enjoy.
If anyone wishes to remix any of these songs, PM me and I'll work to get you stuff. It's probably not really possible to remix Re/Visiting and Re/Gaia as they are completely separate projects at times but overall it shouldn't be too impossible.
[Edit: Tracks are in proper order now]

item.title: Re/Mastered - James Lucien [Multi-genre EP]
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Tracks are now in proper order that they were meant to be in the first place.
